MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:14pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our team have established an underground cable fault, caused by a third party, and are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:02pm on Monday, 8th February 2021
